title: Major Update: Gaming/Streaming Optimizations + Multi-IP Support
features: 🔧 Enhanced web portal with new features
improvements: Better mobile support with native configs
Automatic server selection based on latency
migration_notes: No migration required - update is backward compatible
Gaming config is optional - existing configs still work
WireGuard is optional - OpenVPN still supported
next_steps: Optional: Setup WireGuard for even faster speeds
